name: BlessMe
0:
”Alexa, ask bless me will you please bless me”
”I sneezed will you bless me”
”will you bless me”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bless me
des: be blessed by Alexa, ask to be blessed when you sneeze or tell her you sneezed. then you will be blessed when she says "bless you"
